name: OSTraining
overview:
OSTraining provides training to help people bulld websites.

The company focuses on open source software and in particular, the most common Content Management Systems. OSTraining teaches people how to use WordPress, Joomla and Drupal.

OSTraining provides training through multiple avenues:

Online Training: Over the last two years, over 10,000 people studied with us online. They get access to over 1,000 training sessions and expert help to answer all their questions.

Classroom Training: Every year, OSTraining teaches over a hundred live classes across North America from Tampa to Seattle and from San Francisco to New York.

Onsite Training: They provide On-Site Drupal Training for large organizations such as Pfizer, plus the Departments of Energy, Education and Commerce.

Books: They wrote Joomla Explained, the best-selling Joomla book. In 2013, they will release Drupal Explained and WordPress Explained.
